content.html: Me: "Oh, json, sweet, I can use jq(1), because jq(1) is awesome!" Also me: jq '.field' jq '.[] | .field' jq '.[].element.field' jq '.element.field | .[]' jq '.element.[] | .field' jq '.element | .select(field)' jq '.element | [].field' jq '.element | .[].field' Every. Time.
content.value:
Me: "Oh, json, sweet, I can use jq(1), because jq(1) is awesome!"

Also me:

jq '.field'
jq '.[] | .field'
jq '.[].element.field'
jq '.element.field | .[]'
jq '.element.[] | .field'
jq '.element | .select(field)'
jq '.element | [].field'
jq '.element | .[].field'

Every. Time.
